text: Hotel Transylvania is an American animated movie series. There are currently four movies: Hotel Transylvania (2012), Hotel Transylvania 2 (2015), Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation (2018) and Hotel Transylvania: Transformania (2022) were also released. A TV show for Disney Channel called Hotel Transylvania: The Series. ==Movies== * Hotel Transylvania (2012) * Hotel Transylvania 2 (2015) * Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation (2018) * Hotel Transylvania: Transformania (2022) ==TV Series== * Hotel Transylvania: The Series (2012â€“2020) Category:Series of movies Category:Animated movies
title: Hotel Transylvania (franchise)
